name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a versatile Software Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in crafting high-performance solutions using **Ruby**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Rails**. My technical prowess encompasses API integration and database management with **Postgres** and **Redis**, along with cloud development using **AWS CDK** and containerization through **Docker**. I emphasize collaborative teamwork and cybersecurity knowledge to deliver secure applications that meet industry standards.
My background includes hands-on experience in agile environments, strong problem-solving skills, and a customer-focused approach, ensuring that solutions not only meet technical requirements but also enhance user satisfaction. My curiosity drives continuous improvement, while I uphold integrity in all projects, further strengthening my contributions to successful development teams.
